description:
Zanya and Tetsuya join the training camp. While Kanata tries to puzzle out the meaning of Guru Bunbuku`s advice, Athora worries about their future as Buddies.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tag Match! Kanata and Athora`s Crossed Wires!
Tag Match! Surechigau Kanata to Athora!!
タッグマッチ! すれ違うカナタとアトラ!!
